import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' //import MakeMeme from './MakeMeme' import Footer from './Footer' export default function ChooseDog () { let [dog, updateDog] = useState([]) const apiCall = async (type) => { const data = await axios(`https://api.thedogapi.com/v1/images/search?mime_types=${type}&api_key=${process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY_DOG}`) console.log(data.data[0].url) updateDog(data.data[0].url) } useEffect(() => { apiCall('gif') }, []) return (<>
